hero.title: Never Miss a Patient Call
hero.subtitle: 24/7 AI Call Agents for Healthcare
hero.description: Transform your medical practice with intelligent AI call agents that handle patient appointments, medical inquiries, and emergency calls with professional medical knowledge and HIPAA compliance.
hero.demo_description: Listen to our AI agent handling a patient appointment booking with medical expertise

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Good morning! Thank you for calling Dubai Medical Center. I'm your AI assistant. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ahmed for a general check-up.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I'd be happy to help you schedule that appointment. May I have your full name and date of birth for verification?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you, Ms. Al-Mansouri. I have your patient record here. Dr. Ahmed has availability this Thursday at 2 PM or Friday at 10 AM. Which works better for you?

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: Thursday at 2 PM would be perfect.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Excellent! I've scheduled your general check-up with Dr. Ahmed for Thursday, October 26th at 2:00 PM. Please arrive 15 minutes early and bring your Emirates ID. You'll receive SMS and email confirmations shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
